languages.text: История Ульфара Громогласного завершилась на заледенелом мире в погребальных мирах некронов. Никто так и не смог отыскать после ни его, ни стаю Зловещий вой. Те, кто предпринимал поиски, редко возвращались с историями о своих похождениях — что бы ни обитало на мерзлой планете, оно было страшно и смертоносно.

The story of Ulfar Thunderlung ended on a frozen planet among the Necron Tomb Worlds. No one was ever able to find him or his Baleful Howl pack. Those who attempted to seldom returned with stories of their travels. Whatever lived on that frigid planet was horrifying and deadly.
languages.original_text: История Ульфара Громогласного завершилась на заледенелом мире в погребальных мирах некронов. Никто так и не смог отыскать после ни его, ни стаю Зловещий вой. Те, кто предпринимал поиски, редко возвращались с историями о своих похождениях — что бы ни обитало на мерзлой планете, оно было страшно и смертоносно.

traits.locale_text: The story of Ulfar Thunderlung ended on a frozen planet, a Necron Tomb World. Later, some tried to find him and the Famehungry pack, but to no avail. Those who attempted this seldom returned to tell stories of their travels. Whatever lived on this frigid planet was horrifying and deadly.

The story of Ulfar Thunderlung ended on a frozen planet, a Necron Tomb World. Later, some tried to find him and the Famehungry pack, but to no avail. Those who attempted this seldom returned to tell stories of their travels. Whatever lived on this frigid planet was horrifying and deadly.

The story of Ulfar Thunderlung ended on a frozen planet, a Necron Tomb World. No one was ever able to find him or his Baleful Howl pack. Those who attempted to seldom returned with stories of their travels. Whatever lived on that frigid planet was horrifying and deadly.

The story of Ulfar Thunderlung ended on a frozen planet, a Necron Tomb World. No one was ever able to find him or his Baleful Howl pack. Those who attempted to seldom returned with stories of their travels. Whatever lived on that frigid planet was horrifying and deadly.

The story of Ulfar Thunderlung ended on a frozen planet among the Necron Tomb Worlds. No one was ever able to find him or his Baleful Howl pack. Those who attempted to seldom returned with stories of their travels. Whatever lived on that frigid planet was horrifying and deadly.

The story of Ulfar Thunderlung ended on a frozen planet among the Necron Tomb Worlds. No one was ever able to find him or his Baleful Howl pack. Those who attempted to seldom returned with stories of their travels. Whatever lived on that frigid planet was horrifying and deadly.

languages.text: 乌尔法·雷狼的传奇在一颗冰冻的行星上划下了休止符。那里是太空死灵的墓穴世界，没人能找到他和他的怒嚎者狼群。那些前去搜寻的人，只有极少数人能活着回来，带回恐怖的见闻故事。虽然没人知道那颗寒冷的行星上有什么东西，但毫无疑问，那是可怕而致命的敌人。
languages.original_text: The story of Ulfar Thunderlung ended on a frozen planet among the Necron Tomb Worlds. No one was ever able to find him or his Baleful Howl pack. Those who attempted to seldom returned with stories of their travels. Whatever lived on that frigid planet was horrifying and deadly.

traits.locale_text: 乌尔法·雷狼的传奇在一颗冰冻的行星上划下了休止符。那里是太空死灵的墓穴世界，没人能找到他和他的渴名者狼群。那些前去搜寻的人，只有极少数人能活着回来，带回恐怖的见闻故事。虽然没人知道那颗寒冷的行星上有什么东西，但毫无疑问，那是可怕而致命的敌人。

languages.text: Die Geschichte von Ulfar Donnerlunge endetet auf einem gefrorenen Planeten zwischen den Necron-Gruftwelten. Niemand konnte ihn oder sein Baleful-Howl-Rudel jemals finden. Von denen, die es versuchten, kehrte nur selten jemand mit Geschichten über seine Reisen zurück. Was auch immer auf diesem eisigen Planeten lebte, war grauenhaft und tödlich.
languages.original_text: The story of Ulfar Thunderlung ended on a frozen planet among the Necron Tomb Worlds. No one was ever able to find him or his Baleful Howl pack. Those who attempted to seldom returned with stories of their travels. Whatever lived on that frigid planet was horrifying and deadly.

traits.locale_text: Die Geschichte von Ulfar Donnerlunge endetet auf einem gefrorenen Planeten, einer Necron-Gruftwelt. Niemand konnte ihn oder sein Baleful-Howl-Rudel jemals finden. Von denen, die es versuchten, kehrte nur selten jemand mit Geschichten über seine Reisen zurück. Was auch immer auf diesem eisigen Planeten lebte, war grauenhaft und tödlich.

languages.text: L'histoire d'Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre prit fin sur des mondes-nécropoles nécrons. Personne ne parvint à le retrouver, ni sa meute des Hurleurs sanguinaires. Ceux qui s'y risquèrent n'eurent que rarement l'occasion de raconter leur périple. Une chose terrifiante et mortelle vivait sur cette planète gelée.
languages.original_text: The story of Ulfar Thunderlung ended on a frozen planet among the Necron Tomb Worlds. No one was ever able to find him or his Baleful Howl pack. Those who attempted to seldom returned with stories of their travels. Whatever lived on that frigid planet was horrifying and deadly.

traits.locale_text: L'histoire d'Ulfar Voix-du-Tonnerre prit fin sur un monde-nécropole nécron. Personne ne parvint à le retrouver, ni sa meute des Hurleurs sanguinaires. Ceux qui s'y risquèrent n'eurent que rarement l'occasion de raconter leur périple. Une chose terrifiante et mortelle vivait sur cette planète gelée.

languages.text: La historia de Ulfar Pulmón Atronador terminó en un planeta congelado entre los mundos necrópolis de los Necrones. Nadie fue capaz de encontrarlos a él ni a su jauría, el Aullido Torvo. Los que lo intentaron no solían volver con historias de sus viajes. Lo que fuera que viviera en ese planeta gélido era tan aterrador como letal.
languages.original_text: The story of Ulfar Thunderlung ended on a frozen planet among the Necron Tomb Worlds. No one was ever able to find him or his Baleful Howl pack. Those who attempted to seldom returned with stories of their travels. Whatever lived on that frigid planet was horrifying and deadly.

traits.locale_text: La historia de Ulfar Pulmón Atronador terminó en un planeta congelado, un mundo necrópolis de los Necrones. Nadie fue capaz de encontrarlos a él ni a su jauría, el Aullido Torvo. Los que lo intentaron no solían volver con historias de sus viajes. Lo que fuera que viviera en ese planeta gélido era tan aterrador como letal.

languages.text: ウルファー・サンダーラングの物語は、ネクロンの墳墓惑星のひとつである凍てついた惑星で終わりを迎えた。誰一人としてウルファーとその破滅の咆哮の群れを見つけることができなかった。見つけようとした者たちが、彼ら旅の話を持ち帰ることはめったになかった。その極寒の惑星に住む者はその正体何であれ、恐ろしく凶暴だったのだ。
languages.original_text: The story of Ulfar Thunderlung ended on a frozen planet among the Necron Tomb Worlds. No one was ever able to find him or his Baleful Howl pack. Those who attempted to seldom returned with stories of their travels. Whatever lived on that frigid planet was horrifying and deadly.

traits.locale_text: ウルファー・サンダーラングの物語は、ネクロンの墳墓惑星のひとつである凍てついた惑星で終わりを迎えた。誰一人としてウルファーとその破滅の咆哮の群れを見つけることができなかった。見つけようとした者たちが、彼ら旅の話を持ち帰ることはめったになかった。その極寒の惑星に住む者はその正体何であれ、恐ろしく凶暴だったのだ。

languages.text: Ulfar Tufanciğer'in hikâyesi, Nekron Kabir Dünyaları arasındaki donmuş bir gezegende son buldu. Onu ve Uğursuz Uluma sürüsünü bulabilen olmadı. Buna teşebbüs edenler arasında geri dönebilen ve yaşadıklarını anlatabilenler de son derece azdı. O buz gibi gezegende yaşayan şey her ne idiyse, son derece dehşet verici ve ölümcüldü.
languages.original_text: The story of Ulfar Thunderlung ended on a frozen planet among the Necron Tomb Worlds. No one was ever able to find him or his Baleful Howl pack. Those who attempted to seldom returned with stories of their travels. Whatever lived on that frigid planet was horrifying and deadly.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar Tufanciğer'in hikâyesi, Nekron Kabir Dünyaları arasındaki donmuş bir gezegende son buldu. Onu ve Uğursuz Uluma sürüsünü bulabilen olmadı. Buna teşebbüs edenler arasında geri dönebilen ve yaşadıklarını anlatabilenler de son derece seyrekti. O buz gibi gezegende yaşayan şey her ne idiyse, son derece dehşet verici ve ölümcüldü.
